store/about.title: Get to know FinamacTM
store/about.text1: We are a leading company in the food machinery sector, committed to providing innovative and high-quality solutions. Our mission is to help our customers optimize their production processes, increase efficiency, and ensure the quality of their products.
store/about.text2: With over 50 years of experience in the market, we have built a solid reputation based on excellence, innovation, and customer service. Our team of highly qualified professionals is always ready to offer customized solutions that meet the specific needs of each client.
store/about.mission-text: To provide innovative technological solutions that drive success and efficiency in our clients' production processes.
store/about.vision-text: To be recognized as the global leader in food machinery solutions, setting standards of excellence and innovation.
store/about.values-text: Integrity, Innovation, Quality, Commitment, and Sustainability guide all our actions and decisions.
store/technical-support.title: Request help with your equipment
store/technical-support.subtitle: Request service through any of our Channels
store/technical-support.speed-up-service: To speed up your service, have on hand the CPF or CNPJ number registered in our system, and the machine Serial Number.
store/technical-support.phone-note: Business days from 8AM to 12PM and 1PM to 5:30PM
store/consultoria.hero-title:
# Count on Finamac™
experts to go
even further!
store/consultoria.hero-cta: **Transform your ice cream production with our expertise**
store/consultoria.video-text: Our ice cream specialist consultants will help you reach your business's true potential, developing innovative and exclusive recipes, following trends that will put you ahead of the market, in addition to assisting in developing better strategies.
store/consultoria.services-subtitle: Choose the format that best suits your needs
store/consultoria.services-card1-list:
✓ Development of new flavors and recipes
✓ Correction of existing recipes
✓ Air incorporation optimization
✓ Nutritional table preparation
store/consultoria.services-card2-list:
✓ Product analysis and planning
✓ Complete technical training
✓ Defect and problem solving
✓ Production and market strategies
store/consultoria.professionals-subtitle: Our team of experts is ready to transform your business
store/consultoria.fernanda-bio:
Graduated from IMT (Mauá Institute of Technology), Fernanda coordinates Finamac™ courses in Brazil and the United States. With 4 years of experience in research and development, she has taught internationally and provided consulting for product development in Brazil and abroad.

**Specialties:**
• New product development
• Production process optimization
• Specialized technical training
• International consulting
store/consultoria.form-subtitle: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you
